short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parse bookmarks to create a Google Sheet with product details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify Your Shopping Experience!

Effortlessly convert your saved bookmarks into a Google Sheet, including key product details such as brand, product name, price, and image. Streamline your shopping lists and keep your favorite products organized in one place! You can create a new sheet or add to an existing one.

Additionally, transform a column of URLs in a Google Sheet into a Chrome bookmark folder. Simply select your Google Sheet, specify the column, and instantly create a new bookmark folder with easy access to your saved URLs.

Note:

This extension may not work on all websites, as some sites use custom HTML structures for product data or rely on dynamic content loading.
